Package com.team19.entity

Class HolidayOverview

java.lang.Object
com.team19.entity.EmployeeLeaveInfo
@Entity
public class HolidayOverview
extends java.lang.Object
A class for storing information about the types of holiday an employee has

  • Constructor Details

    • HolidayOverview

      public HolidayOverview​(java.lang.Integer eID, int totalDaysLeft, int daysBooked, int entitlement, int holidaysPurchased, int holidaysSold, int daysCarriedFromLastYear, int daysCarriedForwardNextYear, int emergencyDays, int sickDays, int parentalLeaveDays)
      Constructor for when all parameters are to be entered upon instantiation
      Parameters:
      eID - Employee ID - Unique non-negative value
      totalDaysLeft - Total number of holiday days that can be booked off by the employee
      daysBooked - Total number of days the employee has booked off
      entitlement - ??
      holidaysPurchased - Number of holiday days the employee has purchased off of other employees
      holidaysSold - Number of holiday days the employee has sold to other employees
      daysCarriedFromLastYear - Number of holiday days that have been carried over from last year
      daysCarriedForwardNextYear - Number of holiday days that are to be carried onto next year
      emergencyDays - Type of holiday that can be booked off - Last minute holiday for emergencies
      sickDays - Type of holiday that can be booked off - Paid leave for when the employee is too ill to come to work
      parentalLeaveDays - Type of holiday that can be booked off - Holiday for parents when they need to book off time

    • HolidayOverview

      public HolidayOverview​(java.lang.Integer eID)
      Constructor that only requires an employee ID. Other fields will be set to default values
      Parameters:
      eID - Employee ID

    • HolidayOverview

      public HolidayOverview()
      Constructor will set EID to null and all other values to 0
